revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_WraithRaise'''
(''no parameter'')
Decreases the floor clipping by 2 map units each call until the actor is fully visible. Once the floor clipping is 0, the flags {{Flag|DONTMORPH}}, {{Flag|SPECIALFLOORCLIP}} are removed. The actor is set to the Chase state and the {{Property|PainChance}} is set to that of the normal {{Class|Wraith}}. Finally, a {{Class|Dirt1}}, {{Class|Dirt2}}, {{Class|Dirt3}}, {{Class|Dirt4}}, {{Class|Dirt5}}, or {{Class|Dirt6}} is spawned within the radius 2 map units above the calling actor's feet with an initial upward velocity of 4. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|WraithBuried}} and derived classes.
